info.title: API to retrieve currency positions based on open and closed contracts

get.description: Retrieves forex positions by currency and provides a break-up of closed positions(asset and liability position) and open positions(spot and forward position). It also arrives at the net currency position across each currency.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.
